description:
Heir to his family`s conglomerate, Juoin Kakeru spends his days as both a high school student and the managing director of Juoin Holdings. However, he is accused of betraying the company by handing over the PRISM System they spent huge amounts of money developing. Lurking in the shadows is Executive Director Sanada, who is working with Schwarz Rose to force Kakeru out of the company...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juuouin Kakeru: Ai to Tomo ni Kakeru
十王院カケル 愛と共に翔ける
